question: Why is AWS more economical than traditional data centers for applications with varying compute workloads?
reponse-1: Amazon EC2 costs are billed on a monthly basis.
reponse-2: Users retain full administrative access to their Amazon EC2 instances.
reponse-3: Amazon EC2 instances can be launched on demand when needed.
reponse-4: Users can permanently run enough instances to handle peak workloads.
